means: [人名] [威尔士人姓氏] 黑文 Evan的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"天"或"天堂"之意。
means: heaven ： 作"天空"解时，常用复数，文学用词；作"天堂"解时，多用大写形式，采用单数。
sky ： 普通用词，指人们头顶上的天空，一般属于笼罩地球的空气层。较少用于指天国或天堂。
paradise与heaven同义，宗教色彩浓厚，指好人死后灵魂长存之处，口语中表示乐园或乐事，在宗教典故中，指天主教与基督教中的伊甸乐园。

sentence.Network_en: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

sentence.Network_en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
sentence.Network_cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

sentence.Network_en: Well, for Heaven's sake, you don't need to apologize.
sentence.Network_cn: 噢,看在上天的份上,你不用道歉.

请问一下这些短语都有什么用？_百度知道 ... but too 很遗憾地 in heaven 究竟已死 in the world 世界上，到底.
天池（Heaven Pool）中国的天池共有几个：长白山天池、新疆天池，华蓥天池，高雄天池等，美丽的景色各有千秋。在我国有许多的 …

jx.jx_en_mean: it suddenly starts to rain very heavily

phrase.cizu_name: move heaven and earth to do something

jx.jx_en_mean: make extraordinary efforts to do a specified thing

lj.lj_ly: if he had truly loved her he would have moved heaven and earth to get her back.
lj.lj_ls: 他要是真爱她就会竭尽全力把她找回来。

jx.jx_en_mean: have a very strong and unpleasant odour
To do everything possible to bring about something desired.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 竭尽全力，千方百计：做每一种可能的事以便获得想要的某种东西

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English heofon, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch hemel and German Himmel

entry.def: In some religions, heaven is said to be the place where God lives, where good people go when they die, and where everyone is always happy. It is usually imagined as being high up in the sky.

example.ex: I believed that when I died I would go to heaven and see God.
example.tran: 我相信自己死后会升入天堂，见到上帝。

entry.tran: 极乐（之地）；天堂般美好（的世界）
entry.def: You can use heaven to refer to a place or situation that you like very much.

example.ex: We went touring in Wales and Ireland. It was heaven...
example.tran: 我们去了威尔士和爱尔兰旅游。那里真是人间仙境。
我简直是到了观影者的天堂。

example.ex: He walked out into the middle of the road, looking up at the heavens.
example.tran: 他走出去站在大路中间，抬头仰望着天空。

entry.tran: 但愿不会这样;千万不要这样;苍天不容;老天不许
entry.def: You say 'Heaven forbid!' to emphasize that you very much hope that something will not happen.

example.ex: Heaven forbid that he should leave because of me!
example.tran: 但愿他不会因为我而离开！

entry.def: You say 'Good heavens!' or 'Heavens!' to express surprise or to emphasize that you agree or disagree with someone.

example.ex: Good Heavens! That explains a lot!...
'I thought you were bringing it.'  — 'Heavens, no.'
example.tran: “我以为你会带来的。”——“天哪，不会吧。”

entry.tran: …只有靠天帮忙了;谁也帮不了…了
entry.def: You say 'Heaven help someone' when you are worried that something bad is going to happen to them, often because you disapprove of what they are doing or the way they are behaving.

example.ex: If this makes sense to our leaders, then heaven help us all...
example.tran: 如果我们的领导人认为这是合情合理的，那么谁也帮不了我们了。

example.ex: Heaven help the man she marries.
example.tran: 谁要娶了她就只有靠老天保佑了。

entry.def: You can say 'Heaven knows' to emphasize that you do not know something, or that you find something very surprising.

example.ex: Heaven knows what they put in it.
example.tran: 天知道他们在里面放了些什么。

entry.def: You can say 'Heaven knows' to emphasize something that you feel or believe very strongly.

example.ex: Heaven knows they have enough money...
This gained me some thinking time, and heaven knows I needed it.
example.tran: 这为我赢得了一点思考的时间，而我确实非常需要它。

entry.tran: 想尽一切办法;竭尽全力;千方百计
entry.def: If you move heaven and earth to do something, you try as hard as you can to do it.

example.ex: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
example.tran: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

entry.tran: （用于以 what、when、who、why 及 how 开头的疑问句中表示强调）到底，究竟
entry.def: You can use in heaven's name in questions beginning with 'what', 'when', 'who', 'why' and 'how' to add emphasis in a way that shows that you are very angry or surprised.

example.ex: Where in heaven's name was she?

entry.def: If the heavens open, it suddenly starts raining very heavily.

example.ex: The match had just begun when the heavens opened and play was suspended.
example.tran: 比赛刚刚开始就突然下起倾盆大雨，所以只好暂停了。

means.word_mean: 1. any place of complete bliss and delight and peace

example.en: The audience in the nigger heaven applauded the actors warmly.
example.zh: 顶层楼厅里的观众给演员们热烈鼓常。

list.explanation: (美国北方城市拥挤不堪的)黑人聚居区

example.en: This kitchen smells to high heaven. What besides garlic are you cooking?
example.zh: 厨房里臭气熏天。除了大蒜之外，你还在烧什么菜？

example.en: Something's wrong here. Somebody blabbed. This setup smells to heaven.
example.zh: 这儿出 了点问题。有人泄露了秘密。这台检测器发出了可疑信号。

auth_sentence.content: The economy may be bad but heaven is perfect.
auth_sentence.res_content: The economy may be bad but heaven is perfect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The economy may be bad but heaven is perfect.

auth_sentence.content: A small twinkling shiner...in the wide canopy of heaven.
auth_sentence.res_content: A small twinkling shiner...in the wide canopy of heaven.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A small twinkling shiner...in the wide canopy of heaven.

auth_sentence.content: Hell is a funnel; heaven is a rose.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hell is a funnel; heaven is a rose.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hell is a funnel; heaven is a rose.

sentences.en: He looked at the starry heavens.
sentences.cn: 他瞧着布满星星的天空。

means.word_mean: 极乐; 极为愉快的事或地方

sentences.en: It is heaven to be here with you.
sentences.cn: 能够和你在这儿是件很愉快的事。

jushi.english: They complained to heaven about the tax burden.
jushi.chinese: 他们对沉重的捐税负担怨声载道。

jushi.english: Great Heavens, how terrible it looks!
jushi.chinese: 天哪,这看上去多么可怕啊!
